title: Blue Shards (Hextech Crafting System)

replies.body: it would be cool if they could be used for enchanting chests so you are guaranteed a skin shard or something

I also have all the champs, so its useless to me too, Riot said that they want to try find a use for people who have all the champs...
but tbh that means it'll never happen.

If re-rolling them was guaranteed to get you a champ you didn't have I wouldn't mind. But I don't think that is the case. I haven't tested this yet as I also own all the champs and have a few champ shards to RR so waiting until the next champ release to see.

You'll get a champion you don't own (unless you own all the champions already). Be sure you wait an additional few days before rerolling, as it takes a few days for new champions to be added tk Hextech Crafting.
